sentences: Stefan Pasborg (born 6 December 1974) is a Danish drummer, composer and bandleader, and the founding member of ILK MUSIC, a Danish record label.
In later years, while kept playing, he decided to attend the Copenhagen Jazz Conservatory where the teachers included Peter Danemo, Niels-Henning Ørsted Pedersen, Ed Thigpen and Aage Tanggard.
In 2017 he received the prestigioues award Gudmanprisen (together with Alex Riel)
Pasborg has toured the most of Europe, US and Asia as a leader, also as a sideman.
John Kelman of All About Jazz said in 2004 about Pasborg:

Percussionist Stefan Pasborg is a young Dane who has, in the past several years, studied with artists including Joey Baron, Jim Black and Daniel Humair—and given his experience, it is no surprise that his playing is daring, although it sometimes seems barely on the edge of sanity.
